summary: This document contains email correspondence regarding RDC alerts related to Jeffrey Edward Epstein and the 2017 Caterpillar Trust. AML Compliance reviewed alerts generated for Epstein and cleared them based on prior approvals, despite negative reputation information. The urgency of the clearance is tied to an upcoming acquisition requiring funds availability.

keyFacts: RDC alerts for Jeffrey Epstein were generated due to negative reputation information.
Cynthia Rodriguez requested urgent clearance for the alerts due to an upcoming acquisition.
The 2017 Caterpillar Trust is a trust created by Jeffrey Epstein, and he is the grantor.
Chip Packard approved the clearance of the alerts based on AML compliance review.
Previous clearance for Epstein's alerts was provided on August 13, 2013.
